Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide (FSAP) family. Pleurain subfamily.
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.19028675]Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=100 μg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=25 μg/ml), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=100 μg/ml);Yeast:Candida albicans(MIC=50 μg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Antimicrobial activity  against Gram-positive bacteria, Gram-negative bacteria and fungi.

Literature.Title: Antioxidant peptidomics reveals novel skin antioxidant system.
Literature.Author: Yang H, Wang X, Liu X, Wu J, Liu C, Gong W, Zhao Z, Hong J, Lin D, Wang Y, Lai R.
